name: Crappy Racing Game
description:
Crappy Racing Game Is S Small 2 Player Racing Game I Made For My Coding C lass where you and your friend compete against each other to get a higher score by driving faster and by not crashing into things, it has very simple graphics and 3 different maps that are just retextures, there are some bugs mainly revolving around the time limit to the game, also hit F2 to go back to titles screen
Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5
